New Records: Bowden Francis allowed the fewest hits in a 9 start span of one season (min. 60 IP) with 24 hits from July to September 2024.
Key Match Events: Bowden Francis pitched 6.0 innings, giving up two earned runs on five hits while walking one and striking out six.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Toronto Blue Jays lost to the Texas Rangers 2-0 on September 19, 2024, at Globe Life Field.
Toronto Blue Jays are now 72-80 and trying to avoid finishing last in the American League East.
The Texas Rangers, the World Champions, are 73-79 in a disappointing follow-up year.
